source:
"use client"; import { useData, SectorId } from "@/lib/data-context"; import { Code, FileText, CheckCircle, Save, Trash2, Eye, AlertCircle } from "lucide-react"; import { useState } from "react"; const DEFAULT_CODE = (sectorName: string) => `

Valuation Report

GENERAL INFORMATION
1 Name of the party/owner
2 Address of the property
3 Name/s of reported owner & registration details
4 Purpose of valuation
5 List of documents produced
6 Date of inspection
7 Date of valuation
8 Distance from branch
9 Situation/location description
10 Latitude & Longitude
11 Valuation Amount ($)
`; export default function TemplatesPage() { const { sectors, templates, saveTemplate, deleteTemplate } = useData(); const [editing, setEditing] = useState(null); const [code, setCode] = useState(""); const [previewMode, setPreviewMode] = useState(false); const startEditing = (sectorId: SectorId, currentCode?: string, sectorName?: string) => { setEditing(sectorId); setCode(currentCode || DEFAULT_CODE(sectorName || "Sector")); setPreviewMode(false); }; const handleSave = (sectorId: SectorId) => { // Extract field names from name="..." or id="..." attributes const regex = /(?:name|id)=["']([^"']+)["']/g; const matches = [...code.matchAll(regex)]; const fields = [...new Set(matches.map(m => m[1]))]; // Check for inputs without name or id attributes const hasUnnamedInputs = (code.match(/]*>/g) || []).length > 0 || (code.match(/]*>/g) || []).length > 0 || (code.match(/]*>/g) || []).length > 0; if (hasUnnamedInputs) { if (!confirm("Warning: Some input fields appear to be missing 'name' attributes. Data entered in these fields will NOT be saved. Do you want to proceed anyway?")) { return; } } if (fields.length === 0 && !confirm("Warning: No named fields found. This template might not collect any data. Save anyway?")) { return; } saveTemplate(sectorId, code, fields); alert("Saved!"); }; const handleDelete = (sectorId: SectorId) => { if (confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this template?")) { deleteTemplate(sectorId); } }; return (

Templates

Create custom valuation forms using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

{editing && (

Editing {sectors.find(s => s.id === editing)?.name}

{/* Code Editor */}
HTML / CSS / JS Editor

source:
"use client"; import { useData } from "@/lib/data-context"; import { Building, Building2, User, FileText, TrendingUp, CheckCircle2, Clock, Plus, ArrowUpRight, Layers, Calendar } from "lucide-react"; import Link from "next/link"; export default function DashboardPage() { const { sectors, valuations } = useData(); // Calculate Stats const totalValuations = valuations.length; const completedValuations = valuations.filter(v => v.status === "Completed").length; const totalAmount = valuations.reduce((sum, v) => sum + v.valuationAmount, 0); const stats = { totalValuations, completedValuations, totalAmount }; return (

Dashboard Overview

Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your valuations today.

{/* Quick Actions */}
{sectors.map((sector) => (
New {sector.name} Create valuation
))}
{/* Stats */}

Total Valuations

{stats.totalValuations}

Completed

{stats.completedValuations}

Total Amount

${stats.totalAmount.toLocaleString()}

{/* Recent Activity Table */}

Recent Activity

Your most recent valuation report submissions.

View all reports →
{valuations.length > 0 ? ( valuations.slice(0, 5).map((val) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Client / Property Sector Date Amount Status Actions
{val.clientName} {val.propertyAddress}
{val.sectorId} {val.valuationDate} ${val.valuationAmount.toLocaleString()} {val.status} {val.status === 'Completed' ? ( View Report ) : ( Resume Draft )}

No valuations found

Start by creating a new report from the dashboard
); }

suppressedMessages.message:
Error: Calling setState synchronously within an effect can trigger cascading renders

Effects are intended to synchronize state between React and external systems such as manually updating the DOM, state management libraries, or other platform APIs. In general, the body of an effect should do one or both of the following:
* Update external systems with the latest state from React.
* Subscribe for updates from some external system, calling setState in a callback function when external state changes.

Calling setState synchronously within an effect body causes cascading renders that can hurt performance, and is not recommended. (https://react.dev/learn/you-might-not-need-an-effect).

C:\prasanth\Projects\axium\src\app\(protected)\valuation\[sector]\page.tsx:46:17
  44 |             if (draft && draft.status === "Pending" && draft.sectorId === sector) {
  45 |                 // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/set-state-in-effect
> 46 |                 setFormData({
     |                 ^^^^^^^^^^^ Avoid calling setState() directly within an effect
  47 |                     clientName: draft.clientName,
  48 |                     propertyAddress: draft.propertyAddress,
  49 |                     valuationAmount: draft.valuationAmount ? draft.valuationAmount.toString() : "",

source:
"use client"; import { use, useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; import { notFound, useRouter } from "next/navigation"; import { useData } from "@/lib/data-context"; import { mergeDataWithTemplate, downloadAsWord, REPORT_STYLES } from "@/lib/report-generator"; import { ChevronLeft, Printer, Download } from "lucide-react"; interface PageProps { params: Promise<{ id: string }>; } export default function ReportPage({ params }: PageProps) { const { id } = use(params); const { valuations, templates } = useData(); const router = useRouter(); const reportRef = useRef(null); const valuation = valuations.find((v) => v.id === id); if (!valuation) { notFound(); } const template = templates[valuation.sectorId]; const [mergedHtml, setMergedHtml] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { if (template) { const merged = mergeDataWithTemplate(template.code, { clientName: valuation.clientName, propertyAddress: valuation.propertyAddress, valuationAmount: valuation.valuationAmount, valuationDate: valuation.valuationDate, notes: valuation.notes, dynamicData: valuation.dynamicData }); setMergedHtml(merged); } }, [template, valuation]); return (
{/* Toolbar - Glassmorphism */}

Valuation Report

{valuation.clientName}

{/* Content Area */}
{template ? (
) : (

Valuation Report

GENERAL INFORMATION
1 Name of the party/owner {valuation.clientName}
2 Address of the property {valuation.propertyAddress}
3 Name/s of reported owner & registration details {valuation.dynamicData?.reportedOwner || "N/A"}
4 Purpose of valuation {valuation.dynamicData?.valuationPurpose || "N/A"}
5 List of documents produced {valuation.dynamicData?.documentsProduced || "N/A"}
6 Date of inspection {valuation.dynamicData?.inspectionDate || "N/A"}
7 Date of valuation {valuation.valuationDate}
8 Distance from branch {valuation.dynamicData?.branchDistance || "N/A"}
9 Situation/location description {valuation.dynamicData?.locationDescription || "N/A"}
10 Latitude & Longitude {valuation.dynamicData?.latLong || "N/A"}
11 Valuation Amount ($) ${valuation.valuationAmount.toLocaleString()}
{valuation.notes && (

Additional Remarks

{valuation.notes}
)} {valuation.dynamicData && Object.keys(valuation.dynamicData).length > 6 && (

Other Details

{Object.entries(valuation.dynamicData) .filter(([key]) => !['valuationPurpose', 'inspectionDate'].includes(key)) .map(([key, value]) => (
{key.replace(/([A-Z])/g, ' $1')}
{value}
))}
)}
)}
); }

source:
"use client"; import { useState } from "react"; import { useData, SectorId } from "@/lib/data-context"; import Link from "next/link"; import { Search, Filter, FileText, ChevronRight, Calendar, User, MapPin, MoreHorizontal, Download, Eye, Trash2 } from "lucide-react"; export default function ValuationsListPage() { const { valuations, sectors, deleteValuation } = useData(); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); const [selectedSector, setSelectedSector] = useState("all"); // Filter logic const filteredValuations = valuations.filter((v) => { const matchesSearch = v.clientName.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || v.propertyAddress.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); const matchesSector = selectedSector === "all" || v.sectorId === selectedSector; return matchesSearch && matchesSector; }); return (

Valuation Reports

Browse, search, and manage all your property valuation records.

{/* Toolbar */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{/* Valuations Table */}
{filteredValuations.length > 0 ? ( filteredValuations.map((val) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Client Info Sector Valuation Date Status Actions
{val.clientName}
{val.propertyAddress}
{val.sectorId}
${val.valuationAmount.toLocaleString()}
Property Value
 {val.valuationDate}
{val.status}
{val.status === 'Completed' ? ( <> Open Report ) : ( Resume Draft )}

No matching reports found

Try adjusting your search query or filters
); }
